title: Sports Committee
content: In physical education classes, responsible for the formation and the collection and return of sports equipment
note: Led a team in a basketball tournament

title: Life Committee
content: We are concerned about the daily lives of our students and actively remind them to take precautions during times when they are prone to illness.

title: Group Secretary
content: Responsible for the convening of political studies for students, uniting them, so that they can correct their political orientation and establish a correct world view, outlook on life and values.
